Hi! In https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/558 we discussed
class-level-inheritance of the @Category-Annotation. For example in my
current project at work we have a set of Abstract Test classes (eg. for
Integration-Tests in need of the databases or external Systems). There are
close to 1k Tests deriving from those Abstract classes. If @Category was
inherited we could easily just annotate the abstract class instead of the
inheritors.

There is also a poll at:
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/surveys?id=3125322

Please let us know if this would break your tests.

Regards,

Henning.
